褭字的基本解释

褭
niǎo
用丝带系马。
古同“袅”。

褭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niǎo］
［《廣韻》奴鳥切，上篠，泥。］
亦作“裊1”。亦作“1”。
(1)以丝带系马。因用以代称马名。
(2)柔弱细长貌。
(3)缭绕；缠绕。
(4)摇曳；颤动。
(5)形容声音婉转悠扬。
(6)微风吹拂貌。

褭字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　褭； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1122第28
【廣韻】奴鳥切【韻會】乃了切，?音嫋。【說文】以組帶馬也。　又【類篇】騕褭，良馬名。　又【韻會】褭蹄，金名。　又【集韻】爾紹切，音擾。義同。　或作䮍。

褭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
褭字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Xian
niǎo
Tie the horse with a ribbon.
The ancient same "curls".
Xian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niǎo］
["Guangyun" Slave bird cut, upper xiao, mud. ]
Also known as "碅1". Also known as "1".
(1) Tie the horse with a ribbon. Because it is used on behalf of the horse's name.
(2) Weak and slender appearance.
(3) Winding; winding.
(4) Swaying; shaking.
(5) Describe the melodious and melodious voice.
(6) The breeze blows the appearance.
Xian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　褭; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1122 28
[Guang Yun] Slave Bird Cut [Rhyme Meeting] It’s cut, and the sound curls up. [Said the text] also lead horses in groups.　[Classes] Yi Jia, the name of a good horse.　[Rhyme Club] Zodiac, golden name.　[Jiyun] Er Shaoqie, sound disturbed. The same meaning.　Or as a servant.
